newsitem.title: QATAR: Most Qatar shares stick to previous week's levels.
newsitem.headline: Most Qatar shares stick to previous week's levels.

text.p: Most shares at Qatar's unofficial stock market stuck to their previous levels in the week to Thursday, leaving the stock index little changed, brokers said.
Six shares inched up, pushing the Commercial Bank of Qatar's 18-share index to 121.86 points from 121.73 the previous week.
Movers included Doha Bank Ltd, which picked up two riyals to 279, and Commercial Bank of Qatar, which advanced one riyal to 340. Al Ahli Bank added two riyals to 217.
Outside the financial sector, Qatar Cinema gained two riyals to 180, Qatar Cement moved up one riyal to 305 and Qatar Industrial Manufacturing Co gained half a riyal to 53.
